nodes.text: Viyo Kobbeth was a male Twi'lek Pilgrim who lived on Tython illegally during the Cold War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.

A Twi'lek male, Viyo Kobbeth and his mother, Trea were among the many Pilgrims who followed Matriarch Kolovish to the planet Tython in the aftermath of the Great Galactic War and the enslavement of Ryloth by the Hutt Cartels. Assisting in the establishment of Kalikori village, Viyo was abducted by a lone Flesh Raider in the Tythos Ridge. After being discovered by a young Padawan in the Tythos Ridge, Kobbeth returned to his mother unscathed as the Flesh Raider simply wanted him as a translator.
